biolockj.module

Interface SeqModule

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BioModule, ScriptModule
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ClassifierModule
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AwkFastaConverter, BuildQiimeMapping, ClassifierModuleImpl, Demultiplexer, Gunzipper, Humann2Classifier, KneadData, Kraken2Classifier, KrakenClassifier, Metaphlan2Classifier, Multiplexer, PearMergeReads, QiimeClassifier, QiimeClosedRefClassifier, QiimeDeNovoClassifier, QiimeOpenRefClassifier, RarefySeqs, RdpClassifier, RegisterNumReads, SeqFileValidator, SeqModuleImpl, TrimPrimers

    public interface SeqModule
extends ScriptModule
    Classes that implement this interface requires sequence files for input.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface biolockj.module.ScriptModule

        SCRIPT_BATCH_SIZE, SCRIPT_DEFAULT_HEADER, SCRIPT_NUM_THREADS, SCRIPT_PERMISSIONS, SCRIPT_TIMEOUT

      • Fields inherited from interface biolockj.module.BioModule

        MAIN_SCRIPT_PREFIX, OUTPUT_DIR, TEMP_DIR

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<File> getSeqFiles(Collection<File> files)
      Return only sequence files for sample IDs found in the metadata file.
      If Config."metadata.required" = "Y", an error is thrown to list the files that cannot be matched to a metadata row.

      • Methods inherited from interface biolockj.module.ScriptModule

        buildScript, buildScriptForPairedReads, getJobParams, getMainScript, getScriptDir, getScriptErrors, getTimeout, getWorkerScriptFunctions

      • Methods inherited from interface biolockj.module.BioModule

        checkDependencies, cleanUp, executeTask, getID, getInputFiles, getModuleDir, getOutputDir, getPostRequisiteModules, getPreRequisiteModules, getSummary, getTempDir, init, isValidInputModule

    • Method Detail

      • getSeqFiles

        List<File> getSeqFiles(Collection<File> files)
                throws Exception
        Return only sequence files for sample IDs found in the metadata file.
        If Config."metadata.required" = "Y", an error is thrown to list the files that cannot be matched to a metadata row.
        Parameters:
        files - Module input files
        Returns:
        Module sequence files
        Throws:
        Exception - if no input files are found
